dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It’s been another week. Please tell me you finally fixed my bill.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Good news, Mr. Miller. I just checked, and the adjustments were processed this morning.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Are you sure this time? Because I’ve heard that before.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Yes, I personally reviewed your account before calling you today.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So what was the problem all along?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It turns out there was a duplicate entry in the billing system, which we’ve now corrected.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And what about the charges from last month and the month before?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Those have all been credited back to your account.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And the goodwill credit you promised?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: That’s also applied. You’ll see a $50 credit on your next statement.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Hmm. I want written confirmation.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ll email you a detailed summary right after this call.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And the flag you mentioned to prevent this happening again?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Already placed. Your account is now monitored for any irregularities.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Good. What about my autopay? Will it deduct the correct amount?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Yes, autopay has been updated to reflect the corrected charges.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay. What happens if it’s wrong again?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: In that unlikely case, you can contact me directly, and I’ll fix it immediately.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You better. This whole ordeal has been a nightmare.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I completely understand. I truly appreciate your patience throughout this process.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So my balance now is what?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Your current balance is $42.17 after all adjustments.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And when will that show online?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It should already reflect online, but at most within 24 hours.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’ll check right after this call.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: That’s great. Feel free to reach out if you see anything incorrect.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine. At least it’s resolved now.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Yes, Mr. Miller. I’ve personally ensured everything is corrected.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay. I appreciate you finally getting it done.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It’s been my priority to resolve this for you.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. Anything else I need to do?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: No, you’re all set. Just keep an eye on your next statement for confirmation.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Will do. Thanks for fixing this.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re very welcome. Thank you for giving us the chance to make it right.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright then. Goodbye.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Have a wonderful day, Mr. Miller. Goodbye.
